name: BeatSaver - Compact Dark List
description:
(NOTE: 12/15/2018: With the site maintainer stepping down and the major changes that made the site even hotter garbage, I'm putting these styles on hold. Anything I make right now will be incompatible with minor site changes, so not worth my time.) (NOTE 11/13/2018: Site redesign broke mah styles! Gimme a few days to update em.) Complete redesign BeatSaver in list format. 4 variants available as separate styles:
  • BeatSaver - Compact Dark Wide
  • BeatSaver - Compact Dark Square
  • BeatSaver - Compact Dark List
  • BeatSaver - Compact Dark Tall
additional_info:
All use the same base theme (navbar, colors, various non-track list pages like song details and account login), and only change the way tracks are listed. At some point I might combine them into a single uber-style with a configure option, but no promises.

Background image can be removed by commenting out 1 line (see code comments).

Made on Firefox Dev, but took a quick peek on Chrome and looked the same. I'm still tweaking Tall because of FFx-Chrome nuances, but that should be ironed out soon. 

I may modify this (add the option) to be even less tall for those that like even wider browser windows, but formatting can be janky with the way the site has everything set up now.

Keywords: BeatSaver, BeatSaber, Beat Saber

v1.0 - 2018/09/20 - First release.
